intro: Stenostomum densiflorum, commonly known as the denseflower stenostomum, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Malvaceae. It is characterized by its upright growth habit and produces small, clustered flowers that are typically pink or purple in color. The plant features palmately lobed leaves that are often hairy, contributing to its distinctive appearance. It is native to tropical and subtropical regions of Africa and thrives in moist, well-drained soils. Stenostomum densiflorum is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and showy blooms.
